title: 250 Veg Recipes for Student Housing
description: The author's recipes have made the whole idea of Indian institutional cooking more exciting than ever.' - Prasenjit Dey (Professional Chef). '... the food so healthy, so delicious with such a variety reminds that of home food with a touch of love.' - Salil Sengupta (Parent) 'The food actually gives meaning to the quote 'home away from home'. Makes me feel closer to a home like lovely atmosphere.' - Arnav Mishra (Student Batch '16) '... varieties of recipes with amalgamation of ingredients from countrywide, fostering a unique taste in every dish.' - Dipender Singh (Student Batch '15).
author: Saket Jalan
